biotools.summary: It is a reference database of Escherichia coli K-12. Transcriptional regulation is now part of a unit that initiates with the signal and continues with the signal transduction to the core of regulation, modifying expression of the affected target genes responsible for the response. It has summaries for every transcription factor (TF) and TF-binding sites with internal symmetry.

bioschemas.name: RegulonDB
